document_data.name: Mordenkainen's Encompassing Vision
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mordenkainen's encompassing vision''''' was an uncommon [[spell]] which increased a caster's vision.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the visual ability of the caster increased greatly. It allowed the caster to have a full 360-degree view. Additionally, it was able to function alongside [[infravision]], [[ultravision]], and X-ray vision. If this spell was cast with the ''[[detect invisibility]]'' spell, the caster was able to see invisible creatures, as well as astral and ethereal creatures.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]]: a special crystal disk with eight eyes carved into it.
